title: "How will artificial intelligence change the value of human skillsets?"
excerpt: "Nevertheless, as part of the shift, humans will need to acquire new skills in order to stay ahead, such as increased AI literacy. This might include greater familiarity with large language models such as ChatGPT, to understand where the underlying data comes from, and whether there are biases in the algorithms, or other flaws."
